title: Add custom domain support and social media preview cards

requirements.text: Add custom domain configuration interface in the Admin Dashboard that allows administrators to view instructions for setting up a custom domain (DNS CNAME records pointing to the Internet Computer canister URL) and displays the current domain status
acceptanceCriteria: Admin Dashboard contains a new 'Custom Domain' section
Section displays step-by-step DNS configuration instructions
Shows the current canister URL for CNAME configuration
Includes verification status for custom domain setup

requirements.text: Add Open Graph and Twitter Card meta tags to the application HTML head to enable rich social media previews when sharing the app link, including title, description, and preview image
acceptanceCriteria: HTML head includes og:title, og:description, og:image, and og:url meta tags
HTML head includes twitter:card, twitter:title, twitter:description, and twitter:image meta tags
Meta tags reflect the Gut Punch app identity and security scanning purpose
Preview image is appropriate for social media sharing (1200x630px recommended)

requirements.text: Display the shareable app URL prominently in the application interface with a copy-to-clipboard button to make sharing easier for users
acceptanceCriteria: App URL is displayed in a visible location (Header, Footer, or Settings)
Copy button triggers clipboard write and shows confirmation feedback
URL adapts if custom domain is configured

constraints: Do not modify authentication logic in useInternetIdentity.ts
Do not edit UI component sources in frontend/src/components/ui
Custom domain setup is informational only - actual DNS configuration happens externally
nonGoals: Backend custom domain validation or DNS verification logic
Dynamic og:image generation based on user content

required: Social media preview card showing the Gut Punch logo with a secure shield icon and tagline 'AI-Powered Scam Detection' on a clean gradient background (social-preview.dim_1200x630.png)
